lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [dramatic music]

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Also ale!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As she hiked down the mountain towards Stillben, she meditated on the task ahead. Part of the Aramente is proving yourself a strong warrior, a valiant protector, and a wise and compassionate leader. With this knowledge, one thought plays on repeat in her mind: Is she even worthy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then one night, Percy had a dream. A roaring cloud of smoke offered him vengeance against those who destroyed his family. When he awoke, Percy began to design his first gun. (gunshot)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Gripping her holy symbol in one hand, and her morningstar in the other, this time, Pike is ready.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Count on Scanlan for a hearty laugh, a rollicking song, and a twinkle in his eye that melts hearts and makes the females swoon.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Some may describe me as buffoonish, but I say poppycock to all that. I am much sharper than most give me credit for. I just don't pay attention to things sometimes. I've also been known to be rather cunning, loyal, happy-go-lucky, and well, dangerous. I can't help but show my true scales every now and then. But overall, I think I'm quite friendly for a dragonborn!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: An outsider since birth, Vax quickly learned to solve life's challenges in his own particular way, often by side-stepping them entirely. And when his knack for circumventing adversity isn't enough, (knife scraping) the way of blades the elves schooled him in more than makes up the difference.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: [dramatic music]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: What's up, internet? I've got a quick announcement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Aaron's a little young to be running a bookstore. That's all I have to say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I consider that a very fine entrepreneurial position. You're getting started young, good man.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: So guys, enjoy the game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much, and thank you again, Aaron and Aaron's books. That's awesome, guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who was that strange masked man just now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Happy Birthday, Kit!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We love you, Kit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Happy birthday!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Awesome, thank you so much, Kit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, shots first, then draw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly, it's priorities! Also, anyone have any announcements they want to mention before we start the game? Any upcoming stuff?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Justice League thing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true, yeah! DC Kids on Youtube just released their new Super Friends animated series that both me and Travis are in.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Who are you? Who do you guys play?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you play Lex Luthor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lex Luthor, and you play Superman.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Son of a bitch!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Interesting choice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can feel the tension.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a really, really cute show, it's a lot of fun, it's very much a playback to the classic Super Friends cartoon, that kind of comedic atmosphere. You should check it out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're Superman?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (Clarota voice) Does he talk like this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's the best.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's every character I do now. Matthew Mercer, reading for Superman: (croaking noise) Also, if anyone else has any other announcements they want to mention?

lines.name: MARISHA, ORION
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You go first.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Whatchamacallit, a few weeks ago me and Matthew wore these really cool shirts with the vermilion bird from Rubrum, which is in Type-0, the Final Fantasy that we're both in! That shirt was made from Greven, g-r-e-v-e-n, at Redbubble, and we wanted to thank him for those shirts, along with this awesome Final Fantasy shirt, made by August8913, where she did this super cool, it says Nine on the back, his says Trey. Thank you guys, for the really cool shirts.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aw, yeah! Jumped on the jam, boogie-woogie jam-slam.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to be at Lock and Load this weekend in Seattle, which is the War Machine Hordes con for Privateer Press.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! It's awesome, I'm going to be dressed up in my Scar costume. It's going to be awesome, I'm going to be doing a big transformation with Espionage. Yeah, and we're actually going to be pushing the stream; they're going to be streaming it and Geek&Sundry is going to be hosting the Lock and Load stream, so tune in and watch me prance around at Lock and Load in Seattle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Those are impressive shoes to prance in, by the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, some intense stripper heels, yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Who'd you play?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kreoss.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You were Kreoss, by the way, War Machine Tactics, Matthew Mercer is Kreoss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kreoss, Asphyxius, couple other guys.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, check it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's fun, it's on Steam.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Asphyxius?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Asphysius is the character's name, lich lord Asphyxius, he's bad in town.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm Haley and Deneghra and Fiora.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to be at MetroCon next weekend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome! MetroCon next weekend.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sings) In Tampa.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sings) In Tampa, Florida.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tampa, Florida.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Real fast, before we get to that, I will be, for those who are near--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You already did it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many did we have to go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ridiculous.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 50 subscribers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, we already hit the mark!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't we normally hit that in, like, a show?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That works, you guys are amazing!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, that's awesome!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Thank you, everyone!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll finish my last announcement, then we'll go to that.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I'm going to go ahead and start the giveaway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go, start the giveaway!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When is the next giveaway?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We're going to do-- Those pictures already exist, they shared them with the chatroom. Yeah, so we're going to do this. We're going to do a whole other set of these when we get to the next 50.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, a whole other set? There's another one?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Technically, we have four sets.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: See you in five minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Every 50 subscribers another set goes out, guys, so that's amazing.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I could have Sam fart on this for you, if you want.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Again? Already done, friend, already done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whoa. Okay, there we go. (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The world just ended.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was close. I just rolled a one on my camera save. Final announcement before we get to the game, for those who are-- (shushing noises)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Sorry. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can't all talk at once. Also, this weekend I'll be in Sandusky, Ohio, at Colossal Con along with such great folks as Johnny Yong Bosch, Steve Blum, other fun greats--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that at the water park?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Son of a bitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Yeah, because water parks are totally sanitary. Hot tub's going to be great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The dysentery afterwards is--

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Flyingsquid63 is the winner.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Flyingsquid63!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Congratulations, that's awesome.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's an awesome name.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh look, and it's green. You're winning green speckled dice, like squid colors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go, that worked out well, very Cthulhu-ian.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm justifying. Shut up, Liam! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well awesome, so we hit our next 50, we'll do another giveaway, we have three more of those packages to give out, guys, so hopefully keep that up. All right, anything else or should we get back into the chaos?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm scared!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You should be.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I really am.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We beat the bad guy! It's fine, it's all fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where we left off.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I forgot to ask you something before the game, it's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Upon finding their way into the final cavern, they used their magic carpet to completely go around the giant city of Yug'Voril, perch on top of the temple in the center of the city, and using a polymorphed fomorian giant (laughs), cascading down hundreds upon hundreds of feet, through the glass structure on top, managed to break their way into the temple, after which a very dangerous battle with K'Varn the beholder took place. A number of very close calls. I posted the stats for them after the fight, if any of you guys got a chance to see it. They made saving throws where it counted, or we'd have a lot more party members that'd be permanently dead. But they managed to take him out; using Tiberius's Telekinesis, they tore the horn from its forehead and the beholder fell to the ground, unmoving and finally killed, as opposed to its undead form, and that's where we begin. As you guys all sit there looking around yourselves, adrenaline still pumping in your ears, the flow of blood.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Pike--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's me! What do you need?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Do you have spell of Restoration, the thing that can reverse stone?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, I do.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Clarota, what do you suggest we do? Do we stay, do we leave, or do we-- what do you? There are hundreds upon thousands of illithid rushing at us right now, and they don't like me very much, by the way--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should get out of here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, Clarota turns to you and says, "You. Bring her." Points to Kima, who is still frozen in stone mid-wielding her maul.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: To carry her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Stay but a moment; I will talk to them."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Talk to the hive.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Very good. Wait, do you want her un-stoned, or still stoned?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, hang on. Maybe before we unstone Kima, we talk about what we should do with the Horn.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: This is exactly what has to do with the Horn. Is there any way, Pike, could you perhaps half-cast it and hold the spell, don't quite undo her legs from stone, I don't want her to be mobile. I want to ask her--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know if I--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I may, very quickly, are you with us, Tiberius?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We will discuss that when we get out of here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because you disappeared for like, the whole fight. Are you with us?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I am with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you going to disappear again?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: To be fair, Scanlan, I never disappeared to begin with!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, you weren't there when we needed you the most. You were out doing God-knows-what.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Quite the contrary. If it wasn't for me, you'd still be fighting that damn thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What on earth are you talking about?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dispel Magic. Yes, I did.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Counterspell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I have a will save?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, you're done, you're quiet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That low enough level? No, unfortunately.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: The idea, which I will share-- we don't have time to do that--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I turn him into a goat.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: He has to say that, it doesn't work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So the idea is, Pike, if we ask her why she wants the horn, if there is any other reason but to destroy it, we have to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, then I'll Banish him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How about-- well, hold on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He can't stop it, he can't talk!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also requires verbal casting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have to touch him, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also have to be able to speak.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So while you're talking to them, Scanlan is tapping you and mouthing words angrily.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: The idea is, if she doesn't want to destroy it, I say there's something awful, and Keyleth, I believe you want to destroy it, yes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, yes, I mean why does she want to take it back up to the surface if it's that terrible?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I know this is, did you say Orcus, is that his name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Orcus, yes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: This thing is no good at all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why don't we just throw it in some lava?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Where is some lava? I would much like to do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we're around lava, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We were.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're not around lava now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a thing of earth. Perhaps taking it to the surface is necessary to destroy it. Why don't we have a conversation with her?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That is not appropriate, we need to destroy this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's get some information first.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I dispel Silence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's get some information, let's figure out--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh hi, hi there.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Sorry, I just wanted to get the point across.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can un-stone her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll un-stone her, it's not like she can take it from us.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's my last 5th-level spell, so we might need to rest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If something horrible happens, we're going to run anyway at this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I assume you guys have come down in here then.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm staying up, can I not--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then how did we have this whole conversation?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, then I'd be down there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was planning on staying up. I'm not leaving Trinket up there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why don't we find out what happens next? And if we have to, you can teleport us out of here, correct?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, I have a wonderful escape plan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so Clarota, how much time do we have before something happens next?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you say that, Clarota turns, and the two stone doorways on each side of the temple shift open and you notice three mind flayers glide in from the side of the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I notch my arrow.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, no! Stop, no don't. It's fine, it's fine, it's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two small, bi-pedal, brain-like creatures.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: No! No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, Clarota puts his hands up like this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm grappled, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're still being held back, but you can try to break from the grapple if you want to roll an athletics check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) I would like to, just because these things ate my fucking mind away. Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, you're still held against the bars.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're like an extra in Big Trouble in Little China.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it's a 12! I looked at acrobatics.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still not enough, unfortunately.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, but I cast-- nope, never mind! Keep going!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As they all approach, you can see that low, dull, kind of purplish glow of the Elder Brain is still pumping, but slowly brighter and brighter, almost like it's coming to more life. You can hear the cage rattling of the various entities that are still inside, like the one that's still grappling Grog off to the side. The horn of Orcus, which is still being held aloft by your Telekinesis spell, is just hovering through the air, slowly rotating on its own, little strips of K'Varn's flesh still freshly tumbling from the side.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And it's at the halfway point between where she is and where I'm standing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So right here?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not this big, of course.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's really heavy, guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As they all move towards the center, Clarota, with his hands up, turns around, pulls back the hood, and steps towards the other mind flayers, hands stretched out, moving up to the point here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (whispers) Can you instill an inspiration?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Inspire him? I think he's pretty good on his own.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: "Don't do anything." I'm saying this on the ears.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need Grog, Scanlan, Tiberius, Vax, and Pike to all make--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tiberius, if he fucks us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think he's about to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Intelligence saving throws.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I'm grappled! I'm raging, but. Fuck yes! Intelligence saving throws?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Intelligence saving throws.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank god I rolled high.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not very wise, there, Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this a charm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be-- no, it would not be.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So wait, am I still an elemental? Is that the deal?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23, 20. Scanlan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12. Pike?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She needs better dice.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I rolled a six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Grog?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Six total. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! So. Currently, all the mind flayers at once, including Clarota, angrily lash out with a Mind Blast. You feel your brains all of a sudden fill with searing, horrible pain. Some of you manage to shrug it off, but the rest of you find your bodies locking in place. All right, everyone who failed their save, which would be-- Keyleth, what'd you roll?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You didn't have me roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you need to roll as well, sorry, you're in the blast there. You're still an earth elemental.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought I was immune to this kind of stuff. (groans) What do I-- not good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not good? All right, that'll be 22 points of psychic damage to Grog, to Pike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I passed, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you passed this. You're fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Teleport us out of here!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It doesn't work like that. It's what I was trying to say earlier!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you manage to resist the Mind Blast, but at this point in time you can now see that this crew, including Clarota, now reconnected with its people, your purpose serving its end, you're about to be swarmed by the rest of the entire city.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Son of a bitch, taint, fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's roll initiative, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should've gotten out of here!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I never trusted that Magneto motherfucker! Fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. 25 to 20?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 21, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. 20 to 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, 15 to ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eight. Against mind flayers. We're fucking fighting brains and mind flayers again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're all going to die.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, wait, you guys run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, you're up first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can start bringing down the palace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm stuck at the top. Until we can run, we're stuck, because there's only one flying carpet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tiberius has got something for us, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Hunter's Mark on the Elder Brain and shoot Hail of Thorns into the Elder Brain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes! I like that idea!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to start bringing down the temple! Are we okay with that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're still in it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Not while we're still in it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I mean it'll take some time, I'm sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or it could happen really quick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys do notice-- you guys are beginning to see what looks like shadows seemingly coming out from the outside, and you hear what seems to be slight cackling of things sort of in the doorways. So you're shooting Hail of Thorns down into the Elder Brain? Go ahead and roll for the attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 will hit, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to be dead in ten minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What, the teleportation one?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We'll talk about it later. Plan B, it's ten minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One minute.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Sure!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pretty sure it's one minute

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, does this mean you can go and we'll distract?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, don't look at it! You said one minute, that's the DM, DM is god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I roll regular damage, plus the Hail of Thorns?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I thought it was.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If someone asks you if you're a god--

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: You say yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You shouldn't look! You shouldn't waste your time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spellcasting time: one minute.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, yes, I'm so glad I'm wrong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 39 on the first hit.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: How many of us are down there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All of us except for Laura and Trinket.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm on the carpet, so I can head that direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then 18 for the second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you release the first Hail of Thorns. The arrow shatters into a whole--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And anything within five feet takes damage, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll be all four of them. How much damage do they take?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They take the same amount unless they make--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless they make a what? Do they have a saving throw against it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait. Yeah. They take half damage on a saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Against what? So two of them make it, two of them don't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, look, I do double damage to objects and structures. That's the thing, I'm really good at tearing shit down.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Now, sometimes fighting isn't the right thing to do!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's why I'm not talking about fighting, I'm talking about collapsing buildings!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The pulsing begins to-- you hear this shrieking in your mind, like the actual presence of the Elder Brain is starting to yell out in pain. You feel it's hardy but hurting. I mean, it's very hefty, it's a large chunk of matter, so god knows how long it would take to take that one down, but it's definitely-- (laughs) it hurt. It's not happy with that. Do you want to move at all or do you want to stay where you are?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to do my second attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's right!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 does not hit, unfortunately. You actually fire down and it hits the stonework and the arrow splinters against it. Stay where you are?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what else to do. I'm stuck up at the top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jump? What could possibly go wrong! Okay, that's the end of your turn. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keyleth!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think my best use-- I agree we need to get out of here, but I'm going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have shadows moving in from the two open doorways on each side right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What, so the Elder Brain-- is this a wooden well, or a stone well? What is this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially it's a giant stone platform that houses the Elder Brain at the center.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here's what I can do. I can start breaking the well, or I can start blocking entrances. I can start pulling down--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That one, the second one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The second one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The second one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The second one, close the doorway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Who's coming in from where?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is one doorway. That's the other.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought he said it was big.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, I am going to-- I can make it there, right? That's 35 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That-- ooh, that's maybe not enough. Yeah no, that's longer than 35 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just bull rush and tear down the well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, do it. Fuck it, do what you want to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, all right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just letting you know, just putting this into perspective, here: you're fighting four illithid in the room. You have a city swarming on you right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to get out! Or take down the Elder Brain.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. I am taking down the doors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, what are you doing? Are you casting a spell?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm going to start-- can I bull rush, not necessarily right next to the door but like right here, and I'm going to elemental-slam into the wall and siege monster this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the movement speed of the earth elemental?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 35 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 35 feet? As it's still able to move through stone as well?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! Well, actually, no. When I move through stone I think I can move 60 feet!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll get you right at the doorway. You can see there is a slow spiraling incline, like a small-- like an inclined pathway that you can see four illithid making their way up right now, with some large looming stomping sounds coming up behind them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Perfect! So I materialize, using my girth to take up the door, and then I just go (deep voice) boom! And start bringing it down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and make your slam attack or attacks, depending on how many--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Slam, I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Since you are an earth elemental, you do extra siege damage against structures, don't you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So (laughs) okay. So does full damage, plus five, so that's 21-- 42 points of damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because of your proximity, you take four points of impact damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I like it! It feels good! This is what I bathe in!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This entire doorway is ruined, and there's a good 15-foot pile of stonework now blocking that entranceway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 15-foot pile?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. But there's a hole above it, where the stone fell through. So there is about 50 feet up a section of the wall that is collapsed down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whatever, it'll make it harder. Right, that's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, do recall that mind flayers do levitate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aw. (groans) God! Maybe not now, they don't?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Tiberius, you're up.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, okay--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can also see forms swarming through the other doorway over there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Teleport us!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: This isn't good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fly us! Get us out.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: How far? Scanlan's only like a foot away from me, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm right next to him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beam us out, Scotty.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Shit. Okay. I cast Fly on myself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) Bye, Tiberius! (laughter)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I redact that, actually. Is it possible-- I'm at least standing next to him, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I don't have to use a move action right now. I can, like, look at him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I leap!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay, can I give him-- can I take off my Ioun Stone as an action, and swap his crown?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I'm pretty sure-- if the item says "attunement" on it, you have to spend a short rest attuning yourself with the weapon. If either of them does.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: But he didn't. He hasn't attuned himself to the thing yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, but your Ioun stone-- you mean take it from him?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would have to attune it to yourself in order to use it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: How long does it take?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes a short rest.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Shit! Okay, that changes everything in a very bad way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing? The other doorway isn't blocked, you have mind flayers running in, you have probably more and more swarming from underneath the temple, probably over at some point, from what you've seen of the temple structure.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay, so I'm going to attempt to crush the Horn. With a thousand pounds of pressure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Because my Telekinesis is still going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I can't do anything else without dropping this thing because as soon as I do anything else, I drop the horn. So I have to do that first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you use your action, go ahead and roll for that, for the crushing of Telekinesis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What am I adding?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're adding your modifier, which I think is five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you focus intensely, you feel that the Horn itself-- the sheer force of the artifact is far too powerful for your meager magic to have any sort of effect on its physical structure.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I thought so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you focus your arcane intent on crushing it, you feel almost like the back of your brain begins to crawl with cold energy, and if you could hear-- if you could hear laughter come from something that is inanimate, you're hearing it coming from the Horn right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck that horn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your action.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Float it into the Bag of Holding!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to maneuver around the chaos because I'm not within range of anybody to hurt me, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not currently, no.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So I'm going to hop on the carpet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is all taking six seconds, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30, that's as far as you can get.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, I can run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You already used your action to Telekinesis.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh. That's stupid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's how it works.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: "Hey, Percy!" (laughs) That's my turn, that's all I can do. And I still maintain the thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That brings us-- end of Tiberius's turn, to Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start flying straight up, and while I'm flying straight up, I'm going to take... two shots with the Pepperbox at the big brain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll twice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use Sharpshooter. That's a 21? That's 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 does hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And should I do both hits?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, roll both.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, and-- no, that's right, I don't critical at 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I need a specialty. Damn it! And that hits, so both hit, and they're both with Sharpshooter, so that's nice. (sings) I haven't pulled my dice out yet. There we go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, gunslinger!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's nice! 25 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And 17 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, gotcha.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, sorry. I forgot, sorry, four points of fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, good. All right, so as you (gunshot) turn over the barrel of your weapon, fire again, the second one bursting into flame as it hits the top of the Elder Brain, you can see both bullets sink into the flesh. There's no impact; they just seem to be absorbed in by it. The flame one, you see a jet of flame go from the inside and the flesh of the actual large Elder Brain quivers for a moment. You hear another shrieking, angry pain growl in your minds just by the proximity of this entity. You don't see it doing too much to it, but it's definitely hurting it. That ends your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Things can hurt really bad and not do that much damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clarota spins and comes up behind you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't be a dick.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Remember our days watching Saved by the Bell together?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are stunned currently, so it gets advantage on that. So that's 24. All right, so Clarota's tentacles wrap around your head-- (gasping)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whose?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You immediately take 15 points of psychic damage and you are currently grappled.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And stunned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings) Grappled and stunned, so grappled and stunned!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that comes to Pike! Pike, you're stunned currently, mind still reeling from the pain; go ahead and make an intelligence saving throw.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ugh, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're just trying to stay alive.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just rolled a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your physical form is still unable to pull yourself out of that continuous psychic pain, you're like (groans) trying to just tear your mind out of it, unable to do so. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I click my Boots of Haste and I'm going to-- where's the thingie, do we have a thingie here?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What do you need?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The light.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, great. How's this work? Like that. If I can run right between Pike and this little brain jerk right here, does that get me within five feet of Elder Brain if I'm there? I can't tell from the structure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can rush there, you would have to get up onto here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's what I want to do, and then, I don't know. That's not my full double-movement, I don't know how that affects the number of attacks I have Hasted, but I just want to stab it as many times as I can, standing on top of this thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, got it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where's the meteorite die?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Fuck you, couch!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Using my poison dagger.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Prison shank that thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, I'm going to shiv him in his shank or shank him in his shiv, whichever is the more accurate phrase.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and roll for attack twice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you scream out "lobotomy" while you do it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a note, as you rush by, for an attack of opportunity, the intellect devourer does reach out and strike at you with its claws.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rolls a one. You just kick it off to the side, it rolls on its side, its brain matter (clunks) on the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I get two or three attacks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get three if you use your bonus to attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First one misses. Second one is-- oh wait, the first was a 17, is that--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That doesn't miss.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hit or miss, it's a brain, right, I'm standing--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Total 17? That would still-- it doesn't miss, but as you strike down for it, there's a psychic field that's defending it, and your blade is held at bay by the protective sphere.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, then I'm using now dagger of venom is 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that does hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so that's four plus six is ten, because this isn't Sneak Attack or anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's ten plus a poison for a DC of 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It makes its saving throw. Rolled a 17.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So that was that, and then the third attack I'll go back to the keen dagger. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. The second one strikes through, the poison tries to pulse through but once again it resists the impact; the third dagger comes down and before it even gets halfway towards, there's a blast of psychic energy from the inside of the containment unit that holds the Elder Brain that (boof) forces your hand back, the attack deflected entirely. That ends your turn. The other three illithids now go.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I wish we had inspiration.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Isn't there a rope still hanging from there? Throw the damn rope!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can climb it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I can probably get up 15 feet and hang there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm getting a massage right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one's also going to turn around, reach forward, and its tentacles are going to attempt to wrap around Pike's head--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't you touch my friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 20?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A natural 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's just 20. So Pike, you go ahead and take-- this'll be 15 points of psychic damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was a good run, folks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What happened?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He rolled a 20.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So he rolled a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I rolled a total of 20. And you're stunned currently, so you take 15 points of psychic damage as you feel-- as you're trying to resist yourself, these cold tentacles wrap across the front of your field of vision, and you can feel this weird, toothy, pointy, biting sensation beginning to push towards the back of your skull. This one--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's it, that's all she wrote.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one here is going to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's going to try to eat her brain!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius, that is a 15 versus AC.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your AC?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: 17, man!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17, as you're rushing toward the magic carpet that just took off, yeah, you look over and the tentacles swing toward you, you duck just underneath and manage to avoid the attack. Now the two intellect devourers. One's going to go ahead and look up towards the magic carpet that's taking off and-- here we go. Oh, within ten feet? No, you're too far away. So instead it's going to go for you on top of the Elder Brain. I want you to go ahead and make an intelligence saving throw, Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 20, natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Needed that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not to Matt, that's to the little brains.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The brains, the brains.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck you, little brains.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you feel a similar blast of screaming energy, like you feel from the illithids, but it's more primal and more guttural. You manage to shrug it off in your mind and angrily look down at this weird, fleshy creature. The other one moves up and attempts to blast you again from the opposite side. Make another intelligence saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19! Once again you feel from the back of your brain this like stunning impact and you shrug it off looking over this way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (jeering) I'm smart! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that brings us to Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm grappled and stunned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so go ahead and make your saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Boom!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You shrug off the stunned effect, you're currently grappled by the entity.

lines.name: LAURA, ASHLEY, MARISHA
lines.text: You're so smart!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Table's getting hot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Aren't you inspired?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then also make an intelligence saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Jesus. Because he's also got the things on me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just say 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven. (laughs) Plus two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Big nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I said big nine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He rolled a 20, so that's gotta mean something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think a nine is a big six.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The 20 carries over one, right? (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Residual?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You take the one and you carry it over.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20 residual.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I personally can't wait until we roll new characters next show.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shut up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, you're still stunned.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Still stunned? Oh, so I got off--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got to break my grapple, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Just go ahead and roll an athletics check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A natural one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A natural one; it rolled a four!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Plus your strength! Oh, it doesn't matter.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It doesn't matter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So it's still holding you in place; you have your axe you picked up off the ground with your chain of returning; you can't physically move from your position as it's holding you there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The axe is across the room, remember?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, no, you threw it over here and retrieved it at the end of the battle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well that's a good, that's a good plus.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (frustrated noise)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what do you want to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could attack with your chain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can attack with the chain?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have your axe with your chain of returning, you just can't move, but you can still throw if you want to.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, awesome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you chop the dude's arms off?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have no-- it's holding me, I don't think I can be like--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe the guy that has him, his tentacles or whatever?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was going to try and save you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well. That's far.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I reach the illithid-- it's far?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you can throw to either of them right now. They're both bent over gnome heads, they're bigger--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where's Scanlan?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Why the gnomes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's here, and that's Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Why the gnome hate?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's rare. It's a rare delicacy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys were right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, I can't-- I'm going to try and throw it at the illithid that's on Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and roll for an attack.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Tasty gnome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All the fans who implied that Matt went light on us the last game--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22, definitely hits, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, it's just one, two, three. Shit balls. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think that's going to end your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I'm done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to pull your axe back?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, I would like to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and you (grunts). Go ahead and make your check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do I, what the fuck do I roll, to the thing. What do I roll? A 12?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. A 20, you have to roll a d20, that was a d12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you pull on the chain of returning and it yanks the axes out of the wound and you catch it in midair, preparing for the next round.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Get it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Save everyone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're up at the top, you have a clear view of everyone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true, you're the only one with a bird's-eye view.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just run. Save yourself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it is, these two illithids look kind of hurt, these two look really rough, this one looks really rough, both of these guys haven't been damaged yet but they have low hit points.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Save yourself, start a new race of people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am going to attack--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hunter's Mark!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to put Hunter's Mark on-- oh, my brother just died.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I fainted.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On the one attacking Scanlan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not on Scanlan, on the one attacking Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What did he do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the confusion--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (shrieking) Help!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Friendly fire!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That was amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 unfortunately does--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Plus! Plus War God's Blessing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're stunned.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But can't I just do it just because?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Once, just this once, please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But he's bent over and I've got a bird's-eye view of him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what? He is grappling and he is right in the way, I'll go ahead and give you advantage on that attack. Roll again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! So I just roll again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll again. Take whatever it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 will hit, okay. Because it is a stationary position, completely engulfing, and you have such a great view from above.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right? 11 points of damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Did you roll your Hunter's Mark damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I did not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't forget Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I won't, though. Three extra. That's for Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 14 total?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, gotcha. That's your first strike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. On my second one, should I just try to attack him again, kill him? All right, I'm going to kill him, try to hit him again. 18?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. Okay! So both strikes (whoosh). Go ahead and roll for damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now it's time to feast!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gasps) He turned on us!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I knew he was going to do that!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? None of us knew that!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I totally knew he was going to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn; Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Every week.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Every week!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know who would help us right now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kima would help us, but she's stone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we make her not stone?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We can make her not stone, except we didn't get a chance to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a big if.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we should leave her. I don't want to deal with that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's up?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can make, I'm going to-- aw, crap. I'm going to phase down, and I'm going to pop up, and I'm going to break the well that's holding the Elder Brain.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Get it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're going to pop up here? Over here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, not there!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not where I might hurt Vax.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that's anywhere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just do the other side!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You might have to do, like, a flippy-poo off it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what are you doing on the well, you're just grabbing it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I? Can I flip?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's embedded in the ground. What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, okay, so I want to take and I want to just punch to crack a big side of it to help spill out the brains.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and make a slam attack on the side

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bust the side of it open.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And then we'll stomp on him and make brain juice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, it's an item, it's a stationary rock, so what do I add? Oh wait, I add-- so plus-- sorry, I'm not used to this. Plus eight, 16?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16? You slam into the side of this; you're not attacking the brain, you're attacking the stonework. You can feel there is some psychic resistance, but because you're not attacking the brain directly, your fist slams into it, making purchase in the stone. Go ahead and roll damage against the stone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Double damage on this.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Big damage!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 20 damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 damage. The side of the stonework crumples inward. Pieces of the stonework itself seem to be jutting in toward the Elder Brain, but it's stopped by some sort of psychic resistance, but the whole side here to here is now just open entirely, and you can see now the hole, the mass of-- there's probably hundreds of various illithid brains that have slowly congealed into one large brain structure as now you can see the underneath area. The liquid it kind of sits in is now pouring out, down the side of the structure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (groans and laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was the worst Schwarzenegger action line ever. (Terminator voice) Hope they have flood insurance, ja.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Geico slayer!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit. That was amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Flo just got real, all right? Flo just got real.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's no better, actually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: From Progressive Flo? All the flow of the-- you know what, never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you only have the one slam attack? Earth elemental doesn't multi-attack?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, just the one. My slam attack is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no, wait! I have multi-- earth elemental makes two slam attacks!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's good to know. Go ahead and make another one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could have done that last time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you attacking the stonework still?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm just going to take the other chunk and punch it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So we'll say you used some of your movement to move this way. By the way, guys, you can break up your movement. You can move, attack, then move if you want to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Unless Tickle-me-Elmo is holding you by the cage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's cocked. 16 plus eight, so 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll definitely do it; go ahead. Is that total damage? Oh, that's the attack. Okay, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ugh, four plus-- 18 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Tiberius, you're up!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A tentacle frown.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So I rush up, and Percy takes off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a note too, just so you guys are aware--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't know you were coming to the carpet, sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, we never closed the other door!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You start seeing a series of other entities slowly making their way up from the downstairs tunnel area.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we can beat them all.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Seeing what's going on-- there's an illithid right behind me, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is. Right behind you, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought she closed the door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we didn't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the other door is open.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I closed the one, but then he said that they could levitate so I decided it wasn't worth it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, man. Grog's being held prisoner by an 80-pound dude.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So I'm running off and then Percy takes off? So I can't get to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he's (whoosh), you can't get to him.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm so ashamed right now.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I need a technical question. Can I move the Horn and let go of the spell so I can then do my turn? Or does that take a thing to do that? Like, I want to let it go--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Good. So as I'm running up to the carpet, I see Percy go and I'm like, "(growls) Damn "Tiamat-lover!" So I bring over the Horn and right at the tip, on the carpet, I let it go. "You deal "with it then!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy? (loud clatter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, K'Varn!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what you get!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I don't give it to Percy, I let it land on the carpet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. I'm saying it's on his carpet right now, staring at him from the side.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Put it on, Percy!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I see the-- oh god. Okay, I can only do this once. I see the-- they're not inside yet, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. They're just starting to get to the doorway. You can see them right there.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Awesome. Okay, that is a-- and this is a-- Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you got, Tiberius? (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (Tiberius voice) Poppycock, poppycock.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Right. I have-- I blow everything. I'm going to blow everything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How diplomatic of you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm stunned!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You cannot resist!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Tiberius.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As I leave the Horn there, I turn to where the door is. Obelisk of Stone. I seal up the entryway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many with that, what level are you using it?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, how wide is it? Like 15 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a little over five feet wide.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Great. I only need one, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay. So I seal that one-- I'm going to use all three right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seal the other one, too. I only partially sealed it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll seal the other one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I'll use the other one on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I'm going to use-- I only have three left. Yeah, okay. And I'm going to use my last three sorcerer points that I have, and I have zero points after this, and I'm going to cast Blur on myself. And that's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. You now start hearing (boof, boof) slamming sounds from the other side of the stone walls. Both sides of the walls are now sealed off with pillars, and a large pile of rubble on that side. All right, Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, before I go anywhere, I'm taking a shot at Clarota.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Betraying bastard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With Sharpshooter, that's 13, 14, 15, 16, 17. 19 points?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 22 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then the tentacles suddenly go limp as the back of Clarota's head (gunshot) becomes a mess.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Traitor!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't believe we killed Clarota!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Some people have no sense of fucking honor! (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Traitor!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, Percy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're released, you're no longer stunned.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gasps) Hi, guys!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I still have another shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's someone on Pike, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's still one on Pike right now, yeah, right here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm taking a shot there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, Perce!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Perce!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pew pew!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah! So that's 17-- 17, 18, 19--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, that just hits, all right. I'm trying to use Sharpshooter, so it changes everything. And that's 18 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And did we get a short rest before this fight happened?

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck, never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No you did not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's why we're all burnt out on spells.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's why we're all burnt out on shit, okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Except me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the other one--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go up further.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Even further? Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Because I didn't help you guys!" Thanks, Tiberius!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: "I abandoned my troop!"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's going to come in handy now!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Am I high enough yet for her to jump down onto the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you could probably pull it off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, if you and your bear want to jump on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It'd be an acrobatics roll, but yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, why would you-- you've got to come save us!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, no, go down and save them, honestly, because I'm staying up top for right now, unless we can teleport out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, in that case, instead of going up I'm going to go fly to the right, then.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Pick up Vax!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I said Vax.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vax?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vax? Pick up Vax?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, so I'm going to fly down towards Vax, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you're going down to here instead?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you can get about-- we'll say, if you're just going--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, go there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: ASHLEY, TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Hey you guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That ends your turn. That brings it--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did anything happen to the guy that had me--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He just took damage, but he's not done yet.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He just took damage, he's still (slurps).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Pike, it's your turn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll to get rid of the Mind Blast stun.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, Pikey.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck. It's seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven? Nope. You're still locked in place.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you heal yourself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She cannot move. Her entire brain is locked in with a searing clenching pain, psychic energy is just clutching her brain and holding it hostage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did Clarota do with his hat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, it's somewhere on the ground over here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Over behind--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over behind this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm still Hasted, I'm going to run down the center over Clar-- I'm going to step on Clarota's-- I don't know if he has nuts, but whatever's there, I'm going to step there, run around Scanlan, and place his fucking hat on my head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then run up behind that third mind flayer, who I don't think has taken a hit yet, and just start stabbing him in the back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, on Pike!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can't get back there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can't?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would he be able to make it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well it's up to-- oh dear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't, with the speed you're running there, because your Hasted speed is doubled, so it's 60 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm Hasted, I can run 12 spaces, so if you think that I could have run around the mind flayer, put on the party hat--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten, 11, 12. You can move right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, great. So I'm going to start stabbing him in the back, angrily.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, yeah, so, first one is a 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately-- no, that does just hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a Sneak Attack, because she's next to him. There's nothing in the rule book about stunned, or unconscious, or anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How Sneak Attack works is if they're next to someone that's aggressive toward them; they feel like they have people on two fronts, which is why you get the benefit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He is, to be fair, very occupied.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say, circumstantially though, because he is currently grappled on to Pike, and is in the process of trying to grind into her brain with his mouth, he is a little preoccupied at the moment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's sucking head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So I'm going to go ahead and make a perception roll versus your fast movement. Go ahead and make a stealth-- roll stealth to see whether or not he takes notice and changes his position in defense.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead. The first attack you rolled was a 15, that hits!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that is a Sneak Attack, he did not see you coming that quickly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, so that is four, plus seven is 11, plus-- okay, that's 17, 21, thank you. 26, 30, 33. 33 with keen dagger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 33 with the keen dagger?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I'm sticking that in the back of his neck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That was your first attack?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the first attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so the first dagger (shnk) sinks into the back of the neck. You just manage to miss all the seriously vital stuff, but you carve a giant section out of the side of its head. The rest of its leathery black outfit's now slick with its own blood. You see it angrily growls, almost this weird guttural, this (gurgling growl) sound as it still remains taut and clenched on Pike, its eyes glaring at you, basically telling you, "Look what I'm about to do to your friend."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so good thing I have more knives. So I take the other one, flip it in my hand and then stick it into the neck afterwards. That's a 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it does. That's eight. Fire damage, I don't know if he takes any fire damage, and I'm going to then stick him with my poison dagger, which isn't going to poison him. But that is a 26 which hits as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And that is eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll allow it. Oh my god. Because that guy was next! If we didn't kill him this turn, she would've taken 55 points of damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 50-- Let's not even say the number.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You saved my life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. And if it takes you to zero hit points, they extract the brain and eat it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now we've got to squish those little brains.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's still a mind flayer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're coming real close.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. Nope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This show is not good for my blood pressure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know! It's like constant fight or flight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think I'm going blind in my left eye.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This should fix your sleep schedule though, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, totally.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seeing both of them get immediately slaughtered, both of these illithids just Plane Shift. A defensive standpoint, self-preservation is kicking in. However, intellect devourers do not have self-preservation. They're there for a specific reason. So this one here is going to move over to this side and is going to attempt to make a Devour Intellect attack against Keyleth. Keyleth, go ahead and make an intelligence saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm an elemental, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You keep your intelligence score as you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The physical attributes you get from the elemental form. You keep your intellect, wisdom, and charisma.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, then 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18, Okay. You resist the blast of mental impact from the intellect devourer, now on the ground with its four feral legs, its brain form rippling. The second one is going to turn over here and saw the two shots, the one that took out Clarota. It turns up towards Percy, as you've lowered on the magic carpet, Percy. Go ahead and make an intellect saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight? All righty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy. That ain't no good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 11 points of psychic damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's an "and" there, isn't there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you take eight points of intellect damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, this is what happened to Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're better off than six, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eight points of intellect damage. What does that mean, precisely?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Minus from your intelligence.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You would know if you had more intellect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Forever?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, no, no, no. For this, it basically-- what's your intelligence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16? Yeah, the blast hits you and you just shrug off the impact. It has to exceed your intelligence.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So do I still take eight more points of damage, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, no no. You just the additional--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the intellect damage is not permanent.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like purple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not quite that bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't not do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That ends their turn. That brings us to Scanlan. You're no longer stunned. You now have full capacity of yourself and you're looking around, oh shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we get out of here or do we try to kill these things?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you get us out of here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can get some of us out of here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Start getting us out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we getting out or are we fighting?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Getting us out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because we still have these fuckers we have to--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Because Tiberius can get some of us out, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just the brains. Just the little brains.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's just the little brains. For now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check, by the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For now, but people can beat through those doors. That's not a permanent thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need 60 seconds to get out of here is what we need. We need 60 uninterrupted seconds.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we can start gathering our shit and packing up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can start packing up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I leaving or am I staying?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You do what you want.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do what you want. It's chaos.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sighs) All right. Then I'll attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Swarming thing that drift up the sides of the temple from the floor. Coming from inside the temple and out toward the top.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should probably get out of here! They're coming up the sides!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We can't get you out of here if you don't come--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's get out of here. (sings) So now I come to you with Dimension Door.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait! Can I do a Mass Cure Wounds before we leave? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And we get out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't made your save.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going up to the top of the-- to the thing. Just to the roof there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're coming up the sides!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We've got to go somewhere else.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I didn't know that. (laughs) It's done.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's fine. It's good that they're up there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And, as a bonus, I'm going to send some inspiration to Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you take a 1d10 inspiration. 1d10 inspiration dice to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog, we would like you to rage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm already there. I'm just being fucking grappled. Is it my turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, can I try it for the third time to break free?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. Go ahead and go ahead and make your athletics.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Use that inspiration die, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll use the inspiration die just in case I rolled balls again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you can use it after you do it. See what you roll and then add it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's athletics, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Athletics, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you (boosh) break out of the creature's grasp. Suddenly it's reaching at you from behind the bars. You can see there's this slick, brackish oil on your body from where it was holding you. Fleshless arms clutching you to the bars.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So is everybody leaving? Should I climb up the rope?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is Lady Kima who is turned to stone.
