lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've got to get Kima out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck Lady Kima!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Pick her up!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought you had a crush on her?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can he grab her and climb?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. She's not a big stone structure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, cool. I pick her up and start trying to climb up the rope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you rush, you grab the stone form.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Put her in the Bag of Holding!

lines.name: OTHERS
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's stone! It doesn't matter!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Don't do that!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take her and-- oh, fine. I'll hold on to her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, put her in the bag!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you make one of those baby slings? Stuff her in your belt?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not time for arts and crafts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You run up. You grab Lady Kima. You grab her in your arms and you rush. The rope is currently dangling from this side where you guys first came in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stomp all over the brain to get to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 50 speed. You can get up to here. You can just get up to the rope and we'll say as your dash action you can begin to climb, if you'd like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to climb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would like to raise.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to rage. Rage climb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It gets you about there. Rage climbing like (grunts).

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One-handed up the rope. That's pretty intense. Go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. That Crossfit training come in handy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. Yeah, it's sore. You know that arm is going to be dead tomorrow, but right now it doesn't even matter. You're just clutching Lady Kima, still locked in her attack pose, in one arm as you're overhand grabbing the rope and getting yourself up as fast as you can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rage-climbing up the rope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's climbing the Cliffs of Insanity! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I should just stay where I am, right guys?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And you should shoot things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to do that, yes. Is there any other-- there's just a little brain in there right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now there's two brains, and you can see just in the outskirts of the temple's side here, two more illithid that are making their way up the side of the temple.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, fuck me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With about a hundred or so just now gathering towards the bottom of the temple base.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jesus. We're going to get out of here real fast! You guys are listening to me, right? Because things are coming up the side and we need to get out of here.

lines.text: But what if there's gold down there to find?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't give a fuck! I'm going to Hunter's Mark a little brain. Or should I keep attacking the Elder Brain? What do you guys think?

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Elder Brain is still inside, just the stonework on the outside of it is currently knocked out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I have a carpet anyway, so let's just jump on it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, it might get sent reeling, that brain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, that's why I'm kind of like, hm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe if-- we should try to get out of here, but maybe if we can frigging hurt that brain it'll stun them or send them reeling or something, or make them mad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I can do Hail of Thorns on it again, so I'll Hunter's Mark it and then I'll do Hail of Thorns on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit. Releasing again, in midair you can see all the thorns appear out the sides of the arrow shaft. It explodes into a giant conical-- just a ray, almost like a blizzard of thorns.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't add-- do I add Hunter's Mark to that damage, or just my regular and then that?

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Big money.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24, all righty. Keyleth, go ahead and make a reflex saving throw.

lines.text: What's happening?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right, because you're right next to it, sorry Keyleth.

lines.text: Oh, it's okay. My reflex-- I use my dex modifier for my elemental, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or deflect, yeah, sorry, old carryover, it's dexterity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten? Versus your spell save of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you take the same damage. You take 24 points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry. Oh right, you're really, really strong.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I've got 100 hit points still.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So how many points? 21?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24. So, all the thorns explode against your rocky physical form; you just shrug it off, like it's nothing. (laughs) It tickles a little.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I'll try to-- I guess I'll just attack it again, because I've got nowhere else to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, 17-- actually no, 17 will miss.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh really, with it oozing out and everything?

lines.text: The second, there's some sort of psychic protective field in the brain. As you fire down, the arrow looks like it should strike and then it just arcs off to the side nonsensically, and then just splinters against the stonework next to the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fudge!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fudge.

lines.text: You going to stay where you are? You going to move?

lines.text: Get on Trinket!

lines.text: Okay, you climb onto Trinket's back. That brings us to Keyleth. You're up.

lines.text: Okay, what's the situation with the brain soup?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The liquid is poured out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And how are the brains? Are just brains just floating downstream?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's actually all-- at a long distance, it looks like one giant brain, close up it looks like all of these smaller brains have all congealed into one giant mind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like a jello mold of brains.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like a jello mold of a brain. And there's fluid coming out from underneath of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Literally the fluid it was sitting in, it was mostly submerged in, is all now poured out onto the ground near you, beginning to get slick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, here's what I'm going to do. I'm going to be like, phase under, phase down, and I'm going to get under where the brain would be, and I'm going to Superman punch it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: From underneath.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and make an attack roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, punch it in its big brain anus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23, that hits, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) 11? Wait, is that my--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, 22! You're right, 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not double damage, because you're not hitting the structure. So 11 points of damage? All right, now I want you to go ahead and make a strength check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, that sounds fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So just roll and add your strength modifier of the earth elemental.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you punch upward, you're still partially absorbed into the earth, but your fist comes through and it slams in, and you feel this sickening thud sound as your fist hits the interior of the brain. It still moves a little bit but it stays in its place held aloft by its own psychic defense mechanism. Make your second attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, yeah, same, 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hits. Go ahead and roll damage on that one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Big damage!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Big money.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's better. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 damage. Go ahead and roll another strength check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It holds itself in place. It's still not moving from within that small--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I stay or do I get out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get out.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Get out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have about-- I'd say it only took you about 15 feet of movement to get underneath it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In my burrowing speed, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, I'm going to start burrowing up the side of the mountain-- up the side of the temple, so I can pop out next to them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your total burrow speed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you'll be about there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're about as high as Tiberius is, partially up the wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm in the wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They won't see you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vax, you're still on the floor, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up on there. As you glance in, you kinda have a brief look at the outside of the wall and on the opposite side there are two other mind flayers. One more coming up on the side and another troll behind it. And the troll's slamming onto the bricks you left up. And these two illithids are starting to look up and see you moving up, and their eyes go up and they can see the opening in the top of the-- where the wall collapsed earlier. And they both look up and kinda start drifting up towards it. So that ends your turn. Tiberius, you're up.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What's the order after me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's Percy, Pike, Vax, and then they go. Then Scanlan, Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to hold my turn to get everybody on the carpet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm coming.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I cast it on myself. I cast it on Grog. And I cast it on-- you're not there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Trinket. (groans)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's on Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I can fly if I'm on Trinket, right?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sweet!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so Grog, Trinket, and--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yourself. Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I (flying noise).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the fly speed on that?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Um, outside?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A skillion.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I dunno, it's right here. It's right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's on the card, the cards I gave you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: The cards! Look at the cards. It's 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 60 feet. You make your way up top and you're now hovering. Trinket's now having another Peter Pan moment with you on his back awkwardly. It's just gotten used to flying on its own, that one time it had. Now it has an extra weight on its back. (bear noises)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can do it, buddy. You can do it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You got it, Trink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh wait, hold on-- I want to turn to to everybody and go, "Fly, you fools."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm holding my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're holding back?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm holding my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Percy, holding back. Pike, go ahead and make an intellect saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. You finally shrug off the effect of the Mind Blast. Your eyes clarify.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does she fall in love with the first thing she sees? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) The first thing you do see is Scanlan holding you. You're now outside of the temple. There's the dark, kind of dull glowing green atmosphere outside the entire Yug'Voril city around you, with bits of blue crystal, you know, against the cavern walls. It's scary. You look around you, you can see illithid charging up the side of the temple, just gliding toward you angrily. You look forward and on your shoulders, clutching you, is Scanlan, blood streaking down the front of his face with a big smile.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (gasps) Scanlan, are you hurt?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm fine, baby. How are you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's right, Pike. Bury it deep inside.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, can I do a spell? Okay, Mass Cure Wounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: For the, well, hold on a minute. How low is everybody? Not really that low?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nobody's really low.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm at 32.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's pretty low.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You two are the only ones.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Can you cast something on Kima? Oh, no. We should just keep her stone for now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're low. You're super low.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, cast it on yourself, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Heal yourself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She can hold this part of her turn until everybody's up there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mass Cure Wounds on yourself? Because Mass Cure Wounds is for multiple people.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, can I just do--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can cast Cure Wounds on yourself.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But he needs it, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's your choice. It's also touch. You have to be next to him to do that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just do your thing. You need it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, I need it? Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At six hit points, I'd recommend it to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were so close to dying again. I was so scared.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I stringently urge you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You clutch your holy symbol. You feel the warmth fill your body and your wounds seal up slowly. You feel a little better, because you were on death's door there. All right. You want to move at all? Anything else you want to do this turn or are you good?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Now I'm at 23. Wait, so bonus action?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Get on the bear!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he can't--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (groans and laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ba dum tss.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can't do that, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can't get on Trinket?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, Trinket can barely hold Vex.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So as a bonus action, I'll give Scanlan a kiss on his cheek.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Do I get an inspiration for that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A d6 inspiration dice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm never going to wash it again.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You never wash it to begin with.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's this strangely romantic moment as she reaches forward, grabs him and kisses him on the cheek and pulls away and he looks at her with this beautiful smile, and then the sound effects kick in again, of the bats screeching ahead and the (inhales) of all the illithid swarming up the side of the temple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Vax.

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: All right. So, that brings you here. Percy, go ahead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh no, it's fallen over. What's the first roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're just going to put it down there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It pierces through the psychic barrier. (zoomf) The bullet sinking again into the fleshy membrane.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ice shot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ice shot.

lines.text: Maybe you'll freeze it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percy and Vax, ship it!

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so 16 total. All right. As it blasts inside, you can see the ice, these strange crystals of frozen liquid, they burst out, almost like it actually freezes the blue explosion in place for a moment, and then the ice just slowly melts away. Yeah, there's some damage dealt to it, but this is a hardy sack of hit points. And it's coming online. So with the end of your turn, the brain, now taken a bunch of hits, begins to pulse with energy, now that it's been freed from its control and it's slowly brought itself out of this trance-like slumber that it was placed in by K'Varn. The Elder Brain is now becoming conscious once again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh dear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we go up there? Can you put us at our height now? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So at a 30-foot radius, which you guys are, it gives off a pulse of energy, (boomf) this giant psychic burst of purple-ish, psychic blast just cascades out of the center and just fills the room for a second with this large dull thud-like "thoom" sound. All of you instinctively look down and see this explosion that just dissipates as it crests the bottom of the magic carpet, which is just out of range.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're wearing the helmet, at least.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, you guys who are at the top, looking off to the side, all the illithid that are rushing up the tunnel, there's a sudden flash of purple energy in their eyes simultaneously. Like now the Elder Brain has come back online and has reconnected with its people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Out, out, out!

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as they can get.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That's as high as they get with levitation. With the full height that takes the top, because technically you guys are up here, I just couldn't put the structure that high up. The only people-- The only person that's in the radius would be Scanlan and Pike. Again.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys make intellect saving throws again.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: (laughs) Unfortunately, you have to do that on your turn. You manage to resist the effects of it. You take 22 points of psychic damage and once again your brain clenches--

lines.text: You feel all of the sudden, the blast hits you and you see her eyes roll back in her head as she reaches up and grabs the side of her head again, nearly dropping her shield and mace, which you manage to catch before they clatter down into the temple.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Baby, come on.

lines.name: ASHLEY

lines.text: All right, Grog, you're up. Oh no, you're up there, they went. That brings it to the top of the round. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: ORION

lines.text: (sings) It's Bigby's Hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh!

lines.text: Okay.

lines.text: All right, let's do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.text: Okay, so that would've been 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. All right. Cool. And then this guy fails its save, so total damage on him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 on him? Okay. So it's still alive, just looking really, really rough. The brain's just now pierced with a bunch of arrows, some of it, it's barely holding itself on top of its feet. And the troll also takes the damage as well, just seems to shrug it off, just seems to angrily-- roars up from the bottom of the temple at you, now seemingly helpless in the current circumstance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So then I want to attack the Elder Brain again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you release it down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very nice, that hits, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of damage, all right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, wait, wait! No, lies! 13.

lines.text: (laughs) No, lies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Reach down again, release this one, aiming towards the now torn-open wound on the side of the Elder Brain as the arrow now sinks in, there's another pulse of purple energy, and you hear, all of you simultaneously in your heads this scream, this screech (screech) that echoes through your heads. As it does, the two illithid that were hovering towards it grab their heads momentarily out of frustration and glare up at you angrily.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Ooh! I took notice of this.

lines.text: I'm going to take the rest of my burrow speed to get up to the top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.text: I'm assuming I'm there?

lines.text: You just manage to make it to the top of the temple, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Drop earth elemental.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would you say--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.text: Nothing good ever comes out of this. What do you got, Keyleth, what are you doing?

lines.text: Theoretically.

lines.text: Theoretically?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll a d20 and add your wisdom modifier to it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. There is an element of liquid to its structure, however it is difficult to extract it from a form that you're unfamiliar with, let alone one that's this stable. You manage to find a way to pull moisture out of parts of it and actually deal damage to it as you're beginning to shrivel sections of the brain. Go ahead and roll 3d6. You do 3d6 points of dehydration damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take it, I'll take it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Make some brain jerky.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They'll have a really bad hangover tomorrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah. Oh, you don't even know the half of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh! Just 3d6 or plus anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just 3d6.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15, all right. 15 points of dehydration damage to the Elder Brain. You can see now the portion of the wound that's been opened, the corners of it kind of shrivel in and tuck in and the actual purple glow in the inside dulls slightly. And you now have, currently, in the air, a small amorphous globule of brain fluid that's just kind of floating there in this, in the air.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gross.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan, smell it! Smell it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius, you're up.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Did you say there was illithid coming up on the sides, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they're swarming up the side. They're probably about halfway up.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay. I turn to the group. I suggest we go to the beach immediately. There we can shore up defenses and I can cast a spell and get us out of here. As I say that, I go (fwwt) and throw a Fireball right at that fucker's head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Are you using your movement to bring the carpet, to take control of the carpet from Percy and move it up higher?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, I'm up top. I have Fly on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's right. Sorry. Yeah. All right, so.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, I just let a Fireball down on the brain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Into the brain, all right. All right, so that's enough to get both of these guys. Go ahead and roll damage. And they both failed their save, so full damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Crush the nuts.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Little brains.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I like that, good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those incinerate. And 40 points of damage to the Elder Brain as this giant echoing explosion blasts up from below. All of you at the top, you are underlit momentarily from the flash of red and yellow flame. As you look down, there's now a sizzling sound and this like smell of horrible burnt flesh as part of the Elder Brain now that was originally dehydrated is now also burnt and singed. You can see now, it's looking a little rougher and it's very very unhappy with its current circumstance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to kill it before we leave now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Pike, go ahead and make a saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Pike!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why a saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still trying to get rid of the stun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So intellect saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. You shrug off the effect--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah! Man. Thanks, Keyleth. Much better now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: New dice!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? I've been doing it wrong this whole time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I do anything, or that's my turn?

lines.text: That's your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're ghosting?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just get the fuck out of Dodge, Tiberius is that way.

lines.name: ASHLEY

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, okay, got it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Classic Tiberius.

lines.text: All right, here's a question: can everybody still fly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As long as I'm thinking about it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well I'm still sitting, still kneeling on the flying carpet with Percy, so I'm just throwing daggers at the bacon brain.

lines.text: Okay. They're at disadvantage at this distance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. So that means, aw man, 17 on the first.
