lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it gets more and more damaged, it's waking up more and more and it looks like it's actually gaining power the more it does.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, and then Percy yelled in my ear, so I take some of the little carpet tassels.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Okay. So as your movement, you manage to move the carpet all the way up, it swoops up into the center of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grab the gnomes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This right here. You guys are all looking precariously at this carpet that is now floating up from the center of the temple. As you get to the top, you look over and you can see there's probably close to 20 mind flayers that are swarming up the side. That brings us to, Vax, Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I pull out Bad News. And I'm going to lie down on my stomach, hanging off the edge of the carpet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hanging brain!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm taking a shot straight down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I'll say it takes you your--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Movement to get it out. So you're there, you're unable to move the carpet, you pull the Bad News out, you get down, you're precariously off the side of it, and it is sagging as your weight touches it, you get ready, go ahead and fire.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Firing a deadshot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, come on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you fire, the blast sends you up almost onto your feet on the carpet again, and you hear this impact sound, this (crash) of the blast hitting stone as the psychic field around it deflects the bullet, sending it into the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought 18 was the number that we were aiming for-- shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, did I have an inspiration dice from last-- fuck.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You did.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did have an inspiration dice from last game! I did! What do you give people with it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: d10? Oh fuck, that's right.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Can he add it now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I'll trust you on that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did! I did, because I'm always excited when I get them, because I never get them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true, okay, yeah. All right. Go ahead and roll for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the brain continues to wake up, it improves its defenses, improves its capabilities--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I understand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But that will hit. So go ahead and roll damage on that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's Hulking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially. So as you release the blast, it hits the psychic field, the first impact you hear is it hitting the psychic field and pushing through into the actual brain matter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let me double-check that I'm doing this right, hold on, deadshot's weird. Plus weapon damage. Okay, so that's eight, nine, ten, 11, 12, 13... 25 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 points of damage. Boom! You see the section of it that's kinda charred and burned gets blown off, and now there's a corner of the brain that's just an open and gaping wound. The purplish glow on the inside is pulsing more and more angrily. It's taken a beating, but it's hanging in there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Will not die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is, you guys have left a good mark on it. You get the sensation, with the swarming incoming, you may start to consider self-preservation, because the Elder Brain looks like it's taken some hits, but it's not on death's door yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's get out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scanlan is up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're out of here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need everybody to hop on the carpet first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're hopping up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm going to turn into a huge pterodactyl and carry some folks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, why not?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's got Polymorph.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, turn into a batwing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool, so we'll say for the time being, we'll use this as Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are a giant pterodactyl, a creature that you've read in books in the past, you haven't actually seen in person. And what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who can I carry?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't used this form before, and this is you figuring it out, so pick one and you can take them with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to take someone heavy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog can fly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can fly on Trinket, yeah, everybody's covered, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's only one person I can take.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the pterodactyl Scanlan swoops down and both its claws grapple on your arms and lift you off the top of the temple, flying after Tiberius.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How do you make that weird?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still carrying Kima under your arm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're getting out, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So I don't have to worry, so up and out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you just awkwardly fly with Kima under your arm, off with the rest of the group.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sings) Sweet bird of prey, fly, fly away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings) Up, up, and away, I'm a beautiful pterodactyl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll get these guys off the board here because you do have two Illithid that get up to the edge here. They're going to attempt a Mind Blast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're gone, man, we're gone!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still holding back. So--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I jump up to get out of range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That can just get Trinket and Vex, if you can go ahead and make an intelligence saving throw for both of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't fuck with my sister.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Trinket and Vex are still there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I know, I didn't get to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They never flew.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I didn't use the movement on the last turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just didn't say it because I'm an asshole.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What kind of saving throw?

lines.name: MATT, SAM
lines.text: Intelligence.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten? On me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Roll for Trinket.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You rolled nine, plus two is 11.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Okay. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So go ahead and roll for Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! I rolled a nine, plus two, plus two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For my ring that I'm wearing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So whatever that was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And roll for Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't talk about Trinket like that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is he the dumbest?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that's a minus four. So that would be a nine for Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine for Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who is, by the way, my only way to get out of here right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So communally, both you and Trinket freeze in place, and Trinket, who is flying, slumps onto the top of the temple, limply laying across the edge, about to tip over off the temple.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) Told you we should've left Trinket behind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A lot of Sandmen in there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well first and foremost I'm going to get on the carpet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you leap up here with these guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Secondly, I am going to-- Okay, wait, Trinket's stunned?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket is currently catatonic (moans), just barely holding herself right there. You can see she's struggling with the flight spell, like she's kind of levering herself into the ground--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket's a boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Him, sorry. I was thinking of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If he's about to die, at least get his gender right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I apologize, Trinket. I'm sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, shove him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shove him onto the carpet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I can't shove him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, he's floating.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, can I do this? Okay, here's what I'm going to do. I'm on the carpet. I'm going to cast Grasping Vine from the carpet and wrap around Trinket and have a Trinket tow vine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Like the Macy's Day parade!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you leap onto the carpet, you reach down, and the fibrous nature that the carpet was originally made from, you manage to pull the essence of that out to create a vine of similarly patterned color of the actual magic carpet material. The various silks form into this tendril that wraps around both you and Trinket and pulls you guys hanging behind the carpet, so you guys are essentially now towed to the carpet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Can she take control of the carpet, too?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I now use the rest of my movement to be like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You currently do not have control of the carpet because you used your action and everything to use that spell and your concentration at that point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm just holding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just holding them there. That brings us to Tiberius, you're off, flying off. Pike is off, Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm steering us the fuck outta here, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You tow Trinket and Vex out behind. As you guys pull off at full speed, the rest of the illithid swarm to the top, you can see about 15 or so get to the front top here, look down at the Elder Brain, look up at the rest of you with this angry look, and as you're pulling away, your eyes adjust to the darkness of the cavern and you look down and you swear you can see hundreds and hundreds of sets of purple glowing eyes just staring up from the city as you all slowly fly away to the far end of the cavern. As you're moving, so are the eyes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sings) We've made some enemies. They're coming after us.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I want to make a note, because I'm way ahead of everybody at this point, as soon as I land on the beach, I cast Circle of Teleportation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Barring that there's nobody there, but I do that immediately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Tiberius, you land on the dirt. You land, immediately begin casting the Circle of Teleportation, you begin scrawling this circle on the ground, running your finger across the gravel surface to build the runes. As your fingers drag across, you can see the arcane light beginning to glow and form the sigils and the runes as you're drawing them feverishly. The rest of the group eventually catches up to you about 30 seconds into it. As you all eventually get back, you and Trinket manage to shrug off the effect. And you find yourselves halfway through being towed by this vine awkwardly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is happening right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stupid wrench.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A few seconds pass, you finish the incantation, you place your hand down on the center of the sigil, this wave of arcane energy blasts off, and suddenly, above this circle, this tearing sound pulls out of the middle of the ether, and this kind of purple shimmering doorway opens above the circle sigil that he crafted on the side of the beach.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: By the blessings of Bahamut, I choose Emon!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, the doorway that he just created takes some sort of a solid form and from what you can see on the other side, there appears to be some sort of low-lit room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Greyskull!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Greyskull!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I run right through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Tiberius runs through. Everyone else?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have all landed on the beach as he finished casting this, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Run!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Run!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all rush through the portal, one after the other, towards the very end is Grog, you bringing up the rear, holding Kima, you go rushing towards it as it begins to slowly close, this only lasts a round, you barrel through just in time as it closes behind you with a sparking sound.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, fuck. I just caked my pants.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Squish-squish.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hate that phrase.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That was something, now, wasn't it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was fantastic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Chocolate cake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all emerge within a small 20-foot-by-20-foot white stone chamber. You all are kinda crammed in this space currently, but you are all apparently safe and sound. As the doorway closes behind you, you turn and look, and on the ground there is a similar circle across the stone flooring, different patterns, different, you know, arrangement to the one that he had drawn, but with some similarities that are kind of a reminiscent glow, almost like a code to this circle, fade away, based on what he had drawn previously.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They won't be able to open that back up?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We are safe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just a quick request: she is made of stone. Holding Lady Kima.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes! I'll go over and cast Greater Restoration on Kima.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Hold on just one second.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold on.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We still have the Horn to deal with.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Horn is on the carpet. It has been specifically not touched.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's just kind of sitting there. The carpet's bunched to the side now as you guys kind of flew into the portal and kind of left it there and the Horn's just resting there.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I think we should get it out of her view before--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we should put it in the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure, yeah. Do you want to teleport it in the bag?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If your crushing couldn't kill it, the thousand pounds?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We can store it there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where are we? You said we're in a room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a small yellow room, sorry, a small white stone room and there is a kind of yellowish brown stone doorway that is closed. There's some very faint white orbs that are locked into the wall. So you're not in Greyskull Keep now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, we're not in Greyskull.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys don't have a teleportation circle installed in your Keep yet. You don't know where you are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're in a room right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're in a room, you're in a 20-foot-by-20-foot room, with two small white orbs on the sides that are kinda set into the walls to give off a faint white arcane glow. There's a single doorway that exits the room that is currently closed.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: The way Circle of Teleportation works is when I learned it I get to pick two locations that I know innately. I picked Emon as one of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay. Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we're somewhere in Emon.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: But I just had to pick the two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we could be in someone's living room right now?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll use Telekinesis to lift the Horn off the carpet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You still have the spells?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, I can burn one from my Ioun stone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we wrap it at all?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It'll be fine in the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not knowing what else to do, Vax is going to go to the door and just inspect it, see if it's trapped.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24. All right, the door does appear to be locked. It is not trapped.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not trapped. Okay, I'll get to work on it, then. 32.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, 32. You, relatively easy, the door comes unlocked, the small, it's like a very very intricately carved brass handle that has swirls upon it, like it's almost like a burst of wind being blown and frozen in gold. You turn it and the door opens slightly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I have a look around outside the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you open the doorway, it leads into a secondary chamber. This is an 80-foot-diameter circular chamber now, so you're entering the edge of a giant circle. There are a series of other doors, almost in respective rows next to each other, and you also see, in the center of the room, a vibrant chandelier made of white crystal like the spheres you saw in the previous room you were in, giving off a warm, atmospheric glow to the entire room. In the center of the room, there is a semi-circle desk that is also made of a similar white stone material that the rest of the room is made out of, with polished gold leaf trimming on the edge, and you do see what looks to be an elven man sitting at the desk, longish gray-white hair, he's wearing robes that are finely dressed, and he's half-falling asleep at a desk with a series of books kind of piled up on the side. As soon as the doorway opens, he looks up, and you hear a slight little arcane tinging sound, like a little bell being rung, as you open the door. He looks up for a second.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Say hello.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes yes yes. I just walk forward and pull down the cloak and say, "Hello."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Stay right where you are! Do not move!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hands up in the air.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do not move!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A little lost, apparently.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Apparently."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Who else is in, who else goes there? Who else, please, step outside! Reveal yourselves!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hello.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (pterodactyl screech)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as he sees you, he goes, (screams).

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I cast Dispel Magic on Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have it anymore?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, I do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You just did it to me earlier in this round.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, Counterspell, and I Silenced you, this is Dispel Magic, which ends your spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Hello.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you cast the spell and transform, he stops in the middle of casting a spell reflexively and goes, "Oh. And a bear. Interesting."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: He's friendly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's real.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a very long, very strange story, every word of which is true, and if you will give me five minutes, I swear I can convince you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He opens a book and starts thumbing through the pages.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No ill intent. Intent? Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need to know your business, your names, and your "affiliations immediately."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We will totally do that when we know--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are affiliated with the king.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, emperor. Just tell the emperor that Vox Machina has returned from Kraghammer, and we have news for him, and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We were on very secret business for the crown, actually. And that is why you weren't informed of our business.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, I'm Tiberius Stormwind. How are you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you wink?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm responsible for casting the spell to get us here to begin with.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) With advantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would be a 20-- no. 35.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. He looks to you, as you guys are saying, he--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not possible. 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He stands up from the desk and gives you all a look-over and says, "Well, I am Gatekeeper "Xanthas, I am the evening keeper of the Traverse Junction here in the-- it's the Traverse "Junction."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Gatekeeper?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We are two hours past midnight."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I am Percival Fredrickstein Von Musel Klossowski de Rolo III, and, hello, and we would love to report to the emperor of your great hospitality at this unfortunately early hour, and we would look forward to reporting of all of your kindness and good housekeeping.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I imagine he would be very upset if we were delayed. We come with very grave news.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would hope not to imagine it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well. I'm certain the Headmaster would like to know your business in the morning."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Headmaster Thurmond. He runs this Alabaster Lyceum within the Erudite Quarter. If you would "please submit a report for your reasons for using the Lyceum Junction property by tomorrow, I'm sure "that would suffice for the required paperwork."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course we will.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are too kind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In the meantime, we'll just go to our Keep that we have in town.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Greyskull Keep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gives you a very, a disbelieving look and kinda goes, "Very well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good day, good evening.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I cast Friends on him and I tell him, "You know of our Keep, don't you?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He goes, "I seem to recall hearing about a Vox Machina at some point discussed, but I "don't get out very often. Running the graveyard shift here at the Lyceum has taken its toll on my "social life."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You poor thing, you should get out more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well here, let me show you out." And he walks you through the rest of the hallways. It's a beautiful, beautiful kind of domed center chamber into a long series of white stone hallways, similar material to what the first room you arrived in looked like. Eventually to a main foyer area, which has a very high ceiling and a series of beautifully carved pillars that show different creatures, almost like devas and demons battling each other as they spiral up these pillars, to the front doorways. There are two guards that are adorned in kinda silver and gold armor with these very high, elven in design-shaped helmets, and they step to the side as the doors open on their own.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Love the hat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guards do not respond to you whatsoever, they just step to the side. Gatekeeper says, "All "right, well, here is your way out, have a wonderful evening and do please return for your "report on the morrow."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, one more question before you leave, what district are we in right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Erudite Quarter."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gesundheit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good night." The doors slam (boof) behind you as you guys exit, and you're now--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Holy shit, we survived! What was that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god! Keyleth just goes down on her knees and starts kissing the ground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that could've gone worse.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, we're home.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just want to get in my bed so bad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look! Stars!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look up and, for the first time in close to a week, you can see stars, you can see a crescent moon, probably just past its single quarter phase. It is a sight for sore eyes right now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm so happy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would you say it's a beautiful sight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently? The most beautiful night sky you've seen in all of your years.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm glad you held that the whole time we were down there, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've had horrible stomach pains this whole time, I'm sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What, are we just carrying around this stone Kima with us, or are we taking her back to our--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, but don't stand right in front of her when you undo the stone.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Actually, hold on a minute, let's all rest before we deal with this one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, because I want to be able to have an extra 5th-level spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we're in town now, so we're safe.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, let's go to the Keep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, so it'll be fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a long way. We've got to go across the whole town to get there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we've got a fucking flying carpet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We do have a flying carpet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The metro's running at this hour.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can probably flag down a wagon, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we're in town!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck it. Everything's possible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go drinking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to say, what bars are open?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The sky's the limit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know, should we go to a tavern and get some ale?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What, who are you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really? You mean it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well what do you mean, do I mean it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's all empty, can we fill it please?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's all empty?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should get some ale. Wait, maybe we should drop off the Bag of Holding so we're not carrying it around.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And the stone gnome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then go out drinking.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't want to lose it in a game of cards.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, exactly. Exactly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And stone Kima.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's eight of us, we'll be fine, let's go drinking.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How far is the Keep from here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say it's probably a good hour walk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, we've got time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could do a pub crawl, we'll just have a beer at every pub we hit on the way back to the Keep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, let's do that! Pub crawl!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Pub crawl!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going to pub crawl back to the Keep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Starting here at Geek & Sundry.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But should I go just in a bush just behind and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have to pee or something?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, and cast Greater Restoration on Kima?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We want to enjoy this.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: She doesn't have a sense of time, she won't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or humor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's put her in the bag. She's made of stone!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We won't tell her how much time has passed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll un-stone her once we're back at the Keep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It'll be fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ah, yes! I put a fancy robe around Kima's stone statue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is so messed up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as you guys begin making your celebratory pub crawl, starting with the Laughing Lamia Tavern, you buy drinks, laugh, chatter, and kind of take in the lively atmosphere that you would find at 3AM. Which is a little, at this point most of the fun folk are pretty drunk, but at this point you don't care, you'll take your own, and we'll take a quick five-minute break to use the bathroom and we'll pick up from there in just a moment, we'll see you guys here in five minutes to continue.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We lived!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We lived!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Holy shit, guys.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: [dramatic music]

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Also ale!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As she hiked down the mountain towards Stillben, she meditated on the task ahead. Part of the Aramente is proving yourself a strong warrior, a valiant protector, and a wise and compassionate leader. With this knowledge, one thought plays on repeat in her mind: Is she even worthy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then one night, Percy had a dream. A roaring cloud of smoke offered him vengeance against those who destroyed his family. When he awoke, Percy began to design his first gun. (gunshot)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Gripping her holy symbol in one hand, and her morningstar in the other, this time, Pike is ready.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Count on Scanlan for a hearty laugh, a rollicking song, and a twinkle in his eye that melts hearts and makes the females swoon.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: However, one day I happened upon a chamber, unused for quite some time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back. We got a little refresher here and apparently our Overlord has an announcement.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: You guys, we're only four away from another giveaway, which is--

lines.name: LUCAS
lines.text: Two away!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: It's the shirt, the dice, the handbook, and the starter set. The handbook and the shirt will be signed by the cast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: And we still have, if we get to 400, correct, next? Lucas?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: If we get to 3,400 by the end of the night, we'll give away a whole other kit like this, with the signed stuff, so you get to subscribe and it supports the channel, keeps us running. I'm not going to interrupt these guys, so when we hit the number I'm just going to give it away through the chat room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, thank you Overlord.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh wait, this is in here. Can I throw this? Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pass it off, it's fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You get the horn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I hold it for a second?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No. Oh, I mean in real life. Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I was like, don't touch it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two of them recognize you from the Winter's Crest celebration that occurred about seven months beforehand. Don't do that, that's going to end poorly. You make your way around the bend to the large grass hill that is surrounded by the river that skirts the outer southern portion of Greyskull Keep. Looking up, you can see against the moonlight the very welcome sight of your home there, beckoning to you to rest. You make your way to the front gates that surround the outskirts of it, and an iron bell kind of goes off for a second, and as you look up, you hear a voice go, "Who goes there? Speak your mind, or a bolt to the "throat you'll find."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shayne, is that Shayne?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Is it dark right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's dark, yes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I cast Light. "It's us!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, a light pierces off, and you guys look up and you can see, sitting on kind of the watchtower perch--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or wait, is that Jarett?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you see up there, short, rough red hair, Shayne Tranter, one of the mercenaries you hired--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, it is Shayne, I was right the first time!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's got her crossbow ready to go, and she's just kind of sitting back and pointing it at the group, and she goes,

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hello! Hi!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hope you remember us!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shayne!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're drunk!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We pay you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She laughs. Takes her crossbow, sets it to her side.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We forgot our key!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, aren't you a sight for sore eyes? It's been nearly a week since you left."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Feels like a month.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Feels like three months.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Feels like eleven weeks. It feels like a very long time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fair enough. Either way. Open the gates! Cordell, "open the gates!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cordell? I don't remember the names of any of our guards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cordell, he's one of the other half-orc guards that you hired when you left.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have Shayne, Cordell, Jarett, Kendrick, and Nitebe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jarett was the one we appointed as the head guard, right? Captain?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jarett? I think so. I didn't write that part down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't remember about the little fellow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Our staff is so unappreciated, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laina goes, "Oh, you're back, fantastic! It's "early." And she rubs her face and you see as she pushes the door open a little more, she's wearing her nightgown, and she's excited but still very tired. "Come in, come in, come in, please, please! "Who's that?" And points to the large stone statue you're dragging behind you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we decided to get a statue for the garden.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Garden gnome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well, very well, come in."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's drunk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm drunk!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the human woman leads you all back in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Put the gun down, Percy.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Bad News.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not Cinco de Mayo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She steps back with her knitted boots; she's definitely in comfortable mode. She eagerly hugs each of you as you enter, happy that you've all arrived, she's like, "I swear it's-- I've not had "an employer leave so quickly after my hiring. But glad to see you're all safe. Shall I make everyone "a meal, are you hungry?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Starving.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He says, "Very well, then."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I love their banter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, they're so cute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will go back to bed, if that's fine with you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there any urgent, oppressing news, any visitors that we should know about who came while we were gone, anything before you retire for the evening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I believe your friend, the mage woman with the blue robes came by once."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Allara?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Allura. She came by a couple days ago, just to see if you had returned. But I didn't know "where you were, and she said she'd try again later."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any packages, mail, post?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "None that I know of, no. In fact it's been very quiet."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Quiet is good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a couple of empty tables set on the side that immediately Laina goes, "I'm so sorry, I "guess I should've taken care of this." And she stumbles off towards the kitchen and you guys all eventually find yourselves sitting, sore, exhausted, mildly intoxicated, around these chairs and take a very deep-breathing sigh of relief at being back home here in Emon in Greyskull Keep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we un-stone Kima, or should we sleep on it?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I stand up and I head towards the sleeping quarters and I just say, "Leave her to stone "tonight, we'll deal with it tomorrow." And I go to bed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I turn him into a rat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dispel Magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a wisdom saving throw, Tiberius.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Hold on a sec. I can still cast as an animal, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, you cannot talk.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hoo baby.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's adorable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go under your covers, go to sleep, nuzzle in.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: In between my pillow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's quite comfy sleeping like an animal.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's a little rat and he still went in his big bed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pick up the sleeping rat and just kinda scritch him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's in bed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's all right, he's fine. Look, see, his leg's going, he's dreaming about something nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We ate already, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You snacked a bit as you made it through the town, but for the most part like, a meal's being prepared. You begin to smell now the cooking of meat, Laina's setting it up for you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're dreaming of magical artifacts, aren't you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Quick question, friends: So we kind of started a war, am I right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Pretty sure we did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kraghammer is potentially in grave danger, am I right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We might want to let them know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should probably let them know as soon as possible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First of all, Clarota was lying through his noodles, and second, even if he wasn't, which he was, he's now fucking pissed off--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's dead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, they're all one hive-mind, right? Listen. This is number five tonight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They weren't particularly connected until the very end, he was dead before they were actually connected.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're angry. They were following us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They may not know who we are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's interesting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't think they're going to scurry up the bottom of Kraghammer and tear that place apart?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll let them know, but we may have time, we hurt them very badly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It took us about a week to get from Kraghammer in, so we've got about a week.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, why don't we do some research, I mean, this was the first time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we'd have to stop them on the way out the hole, right? There's only one way in and out.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Don't the dwarves already know that they were there, and they were already prepping for battle?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They don't really know what's coming for them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They don't know anything about mind flayers, they know about weird things coming out, but not the mind flayers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So let's send a pigeon or something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The mind flayers have been down there for ages. There's nothing new.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't think they'll come up and attack?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To be fair, we also did sort of release the mind flayers from their evil dictator.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, they seemed very grateful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could stop them on their way out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think this will also be a conversation that Lady Kima will have some--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, well, the thing we then need to immediately decide, before we un-stone Lady Kima, is what're we going to do with the Horn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think if we have Allura here, and begin that conversation, then we can have Allura's insight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Before we un-stone Lady Kima?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. I think we tell Allura before we un-stone Lady Kima. Everything that's happened--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The only person, the only person that would remotely know is you, Tiberius, and I don't think--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's a rat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that's a good boy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And he's asleep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He didn't seem to know anything, I think Allura is the person to go to right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you need to share it with us.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wake up from bed!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's sleeping.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, let's wait until Allura's here, I think, and we can--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we tell her, do we tell her we have the Horn? Or do we not?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, yes, we do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why don't we just wake up Tiberius?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tiberius. Little darling!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm still punishing him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm still cuddling him.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Did they wake me up?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No! I'm holding you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't want to wake you up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You start to wake up, and then he scritches the side of your cheek and you go right back to sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it, he's so cute. I don't know what to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laina comes out with plates for you guys and sets up these--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank. God.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're not pretty, but functional meals of cooked pork, some fine mashed potatoes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to eat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you do ravenously, and this is the first warm meal you've really truly had in five, six days.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take Lady Kima's portions and I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There were no portions made for your garden structure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Never know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay, there's plenty more.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So talk to Allura first, then unfreeze Lady Kima?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She sent us after Kima. Kima thinks that she's in the middle of a fight, the moment she comes out she'll be all hot and bothered--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, hang on, hang on. That's true, she did send us after Kima, so what if they're both on the side that we don't--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Allura's going to unfreeze Kima.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to have to trust somebody.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why don't we just hold onto the Horn for a second and see what they do without it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why don't we tell them we didn't find it? Why don't we just hide the Horn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We just hold onto it in the bag.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't we have a safe? Didn't we build a safe in our Keep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did not have a safe built, but you could possibly have that done.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, so why are you guys so against giving the Horn to Kima?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just feel like if it's so terrible, why does she want it for herself?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She doesn't, she wants to hide it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does she want to destroy it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe she wants to destroy it, maybe she wanted to get it up above ground so she could destroy it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a second Horn, maybe she has the other one and wants the matching set.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we know that there's a second horn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's a paladin, she's good, paladins are good by--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm fine trusting her. I was fine trusting Clarota.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want to wake up, do you have something important to say?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, because no one of the church has ever been bad before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We didn't trust Clarota. We were using him as much as he was using us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Some of us truly trusted Clarota.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It went south. Well, most of us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, fuck it, I walk over and I take the rat out of Vax's hands and I shake it awake.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's still a rat!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I shake it a lot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I undo his Polymorph, I undo his Polymorph.

lines.name: SAM, MATT
lines.text: With what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: By Polymorph.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You re-Polymorph him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I release Polymorph by using Polymorph?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It's his incantation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I spit on Tiberius's head and rub it in vigorously.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan, come on. We need to talk to him.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm trying to bite Grog. I am not happy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like this viscous Grog spit mixed with chunks of pork and mashed potato rubbed in your fur.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan, he's nipping! Scanlan. Tiberius is nipping. Please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, fine. He's a human thing again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's not human at all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A dragonborn.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I always have scales. It was nice having fur!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I told you. It's nice being cuddly.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I was so soft.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tiberius, we're sorry to wake you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tiberius, we're having a lovely breakfast. Tell us a story.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Have I rested? What's going on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's been ten minutes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What the fuck? (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vex has a question for you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're all still drunk and awake. We don't want to go to bed yet! Just, just talk with us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just want to hear your lovely little explanation, darling, about what the Horn is and why you don't trust Kima.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tell us a story.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tell us a story!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please. You haven't told any of us anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We haven't talked to you in a week.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: The Horn of Orcus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Horn of Orcus.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Nothing good could ever come from anything it made in existence. It needs to be destroyed. And I'm sorry. Let me articulate these words a little bit more. There is nothing that you can use this particular artifact for any reason of good. The fact that it is even here is a very bad sign because it was taken from one of these beasts.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So why don't we destroy it?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's exactly what we need to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Isn't that what Kima wanted?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if they want to destroy it?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I don't think they wanted to bring it back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Question. Why?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Because there is-- the liquid hot magma that was below where it was being held was very sufficient for it to be thrown in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true. See, I'm with him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, but your crushing fist couldn't destroy it, so maybe lava can't destroy it, so maybe it needs something extra special that only they know about.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It needs the Sword of Gryffindor.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No. Pike could destroy it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ex-squeeze me? I don't think that's true.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Give yourself a little bit more credit. You killed a dragon.

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: You did kill a dragon.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I did kill a dragon. Huzzah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you died. And come back to life. By the way, we haven't talked about that. What was it like on the other side?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's stay on topic here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I'm sorry. I'm a little tipsy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax shoves another flagon in front of Keyleth.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't think I can destroy it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: From what I understand-- is it possible that it's not possible to destroy this and instead it has to be banished somewhere, perhaps?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No. If it could be a permanent banishment, yes. But we don't know what kind of plane and what creatures lie there that would, perhaps, come upon that artifact. What are the elements? Fire burns earth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wind blows.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Light destroys darkness. Pike, you're the only one who--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Rock beats scissors.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Exactly, Scanlan. You're the only one who could-- if your weapon had any kind of light enchantment on them, could probably smash this thing to bits. Then we would have to scatter the remnants, the pieces, far from each other, if not find different ways to destroy those pieces.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why don't you trust them?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Because it comes from something that would--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not the Horn. Why don't you trust Kima?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Because they wanted to bring it somewhere where they-- I don't know. Which is why I wanted you to do the half thing, where we could question Kima without her attacking us or trying to attempt to take the Horn from us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, here's my thing. Even if she has good intentions. Say she has good intentions and maybe they just wanted to bring the horn back to study it. And no one should be messing with this whatsoever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think they want to destroy it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm of the opinion they probably want to banish it somewhere.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I think they do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then why don't we just agree to not hand it over.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We just know that we don't trust the Horn, and that's a perfectly reasonable way to come at it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In the short term, Scanlan, are you able to send it to another dimension for a while?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I don't trust it anywhere out of our sight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I cannot. It is not alive. I cannot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Put it in the bag.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's in the bag.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's perfectly safe in the bag.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about we rest, we put the Horn in the bag, we wake up Kima, we go, "Oh, we brought you back, sorry we don't have the Horn. If we did, what would you do with it?" And then we decide what we do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like half that plan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I kind of like that plan.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I like that plan, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should tell her we didn't get it and see what she does.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Allura is somebody who should not be here when this conversation happens, because if they turn south, she's a more powerful sorcerer than I.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We need to decide, do we tell her that we destroyed it, or do we tell her that we just didn't get it and that it's still down there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can't say destroyed because we don't know how we did that, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we didn't destroy it. We say, "Oh no, they, we got overrun and we had to leave."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But then they're going to tell us to go back for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's fine, but if we ask like what she would've done if we had it, and when she leaves we go, "Hah, we have it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or we go, "Oh, well good, then actually we do have it, you can do that."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, if she wants to study it or use it or transform it into something, we don't give it to her, we try to destroy it ourselves. If she wants to banish it and do something that Tiberius is happy with, then we go like, "Hey, we have it."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When we meet her I don't think we should have it, I think one or two of us should take it away. We don't all have to be at that meeting.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we just keep it in the Bag of Holding, she'll never suspect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, hang on, it's in the Bag of Holding right now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Grog, is there nothing else in that bag of holding?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nothing it can, we took out all the stuff it can turn into some like evil transformer or something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, the other characters can make insight checks too, you know that, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a pile somewhere with armor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everything has out with parentheses next to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we have it, then she's, she could say you're lying--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think your winks will work on her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Legitimately, no one can tell when I'm lying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, we could Stone Shape it and I could like Stone Shape it and bury it somewhere in our Keep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One person should leave with it. I'll leave with it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, it's fucking simple.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's genius.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll leave. It's not like I'm going to talk to the sorcerers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You and I could take a walk with it and play tiddlywinks or something in the woods. That's fine, what's wrong with that, it's easy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a very good plan.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Do you want it very far away?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you're a talker, I'm not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we don't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait. You're talking about just taking a stroll through the forest with the Horn of Orcus?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I'll just hang out outside.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: In the Keep, how about just stay in the Keep?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just be somewhere else. Anywhere else.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You could hang out in the temple downstairs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I fall asleep on the table.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shall we sleep?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's sleep and meet with Kima in the morning.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This was a fabulous breakfast, good night.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax gives his sleeping sister a wet willie.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I put my head right in my food and fall asleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's not forget, you've still got a funny toe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I did leave a little rat turd before I got scooped out. Just so you know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket, let's go to bed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn, I go Minxie and I curl up by the fire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Minxie!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan! Turn Tiberius back into a rat.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh yes, I'm going to bed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Back into a rat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can curl up with me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would you like to be a rat?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I like being furry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's fine. Have your fun tonight, people, you will have your licking in the morning. I go to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys all go to rest for the evening, the best rest you've had in a long time, your beds are comfortable, well set, it's a warm interior.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm starfished on my bed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the first time in a while that Pike, you've been able to sleep without your armor on, and it's so nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sleep hard, you sleep for an extended period, eventually you all begin to rouse, as you all wake up, the smell of fresh breakfast food is already coming to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That and Pike's stank from her armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're going to have to wash that armor, girl.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like when you take a cast off, you're like, ugh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's bad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Actually, is there a bath house in the village?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't inquired. You could ask around if you want.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should have a girls' day at the bath house.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I woke up and took a dirt bath.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're not a rat, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Oh, but he didn't transform you, though.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He didn't transform you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I know, in lizard form.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gross.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: In my form.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's awesome.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Scales, you rub it off with clay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there you go. Out in the front of the Keep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gross!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I have a little dirt in my room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A little pile of grossness.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We just don't fear for our lives for the first time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go down and have our meeting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Enjoy your breakfast. You've earned it." "I think our shift is done." She pats Cordell and they both get up and they exit out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have a good night! I know, I know, but they're sleeping.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I start awake with food on my face and I wipe it off and eat it. "I had a horrible dream "about two walking testicles that were hurting my mind."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was no dream! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am so sad that you woke up. I was just about to go to the hearth and get some ash and draw a penis on your head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I had a feeling something was coming.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Next thing out of my mouth, that's a promise.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where's the Bag of Holding?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can you check in your bag to see if the Horn is still there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it's okay?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I look in the bag of holding and I see a Horn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look in the bag and you see nothing. You imagine something, you reach in, you pull it out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are we going to get it out of there?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I can.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can you tell if it's in there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you teleport something out of a bag?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's Telekinesis, I can picture it and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Teleport it, can you pull it out and make sure it's still there and okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you use Telekinesis, you lift the Horn out--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm not doing that right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, no, check though, I want to make sure it's okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm pretty sure it's there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I want to make sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I will check with Mage Hand or whatever, I got something else. Mage Hand, yeah, I'll Mage Hand it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mage Hand gently and slowly lifts it out, you can see the Horn kinda holds there for a second, it moves very slowly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, put it back in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Put it back in the bag.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, tie it up tight. I'm going to go down to the, what is it, the temple below the thingie?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, yeah, go down to the temple.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, I'm going to go play in the dark with myself. That sounded wrong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a beautiful sight. Even you, Grog, are moved.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just because I'm nervous, I reach into the Bag of Holding and pull out a vial of holy oil that I have. I have three vials of holy oil and I just hold it in one hand while I'm down there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So while he's down there, the rest of you guys, what're you doing?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to cast Circle of Teleportation in my room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, I'm going to go to the treasury first, I'm going to take out 500 gold pieces, and then I'm going to go to my room and cast Circle of Teleportation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Tiberius is gone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's heal Kima.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You just left us?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: By the blessing of Bahamut, I choose Draconia.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius is gone.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so, I'm going to stand behind Kima and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to face her towards the wall.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Face her towards the wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good idea.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Or towards something happy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're ready to pull you away when she starts to move.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, okay. So.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait! Are we unfreezing her?

lines.name: TALIESIN, TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I thought we were going to talk to Allura first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we're going to talk to her first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh wait, that's right. And we were going to do that thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You were drunk, it's okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right, I was probably tipsy, sorry. We came up with like eight plans last night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You were so drunk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, shouldn't Grog be here, he's the one who likes her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, the things I sacrifice for the group.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So I cast Greater Restoration on Kima.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then run away!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you reach out and touch the back of Kima. Her stone armor turns to gold and rapidly her entire form goes back to flesh. As she finishes her swing with the maul (impact sound) against the stone wall. And she kinda steps back for a second, confused, and looks over her shoulder at the rest of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everything's okay, everything's okay, we're out of danger, we're at home, it's okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's fine, it's fine, guess what, we are alive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We lived.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just drops the maul for a second and kinda leans back against the wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just get the leftover mashed potatoes from breakfast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you, thank you, oh thank you. What happened?" She's not even using utensils, she's just like scooping it with her hand at this point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we killed K'Varn, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Obviously."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Funny story, you were right about Clarota. He was horrible, we killed him. We killed him! Hey, you were right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But not before we were overrun with a bunch of evil brothers of his.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we got a very fancy hat out of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, right, look at his hat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should've known all along, you were right, we should've trusted you, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's all right. He had his uses, certainly."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You were right, we were wrong, you're very attractive, we're all quite ugly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That isn't necessary, but the compliment is appreciated, regardless. Thank you for bringing me "back with you. You could have easily left me back and I appreciate that you took the time."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So, you're alive, that's good because you were sorta on a suicide mission.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not a suicide mission."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What exactly was your mission, Kima?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where's the Horn?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, thing is, it's not here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. It's not with the illithid, is it?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's in a safe place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How safe?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pretty safe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why, what can it do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks visually nervous and she goes--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nothing can touch it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, that's what the Order that originally sealed it believes. Even if it's somewhere safe "temporarily, we can possibly relocate it. But we have to-- (sighs)"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You saw your mission as a suicide mission, but if you had secured it, what were your plans? What was plan B? What were you going to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, if I were to fall in the process of trying to get the Horn, others would come after "me. I sent word to my Order that if I did not return they would send more."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I insight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it, yeah, go ahead and roll insight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whisper time! Sweet, sweet whispers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keep subscribing, guys, because whispering action doesn't come free.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many subscribers away are we?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 38 subscribers.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA, SAM
lines.text: That's a lot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That is still a lot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keep subscribing to Geek and Sundry, where you can watch Matt Mercer whisper at people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If there is a way to destroy it, we don't know, "but that could also be sought after. We have arcane and divine knowledge we didn't have back "then, so, in the long run it needs to be retrieved, the longer it stays down there in the "Underdark, no matter where you placed it, it draws like a beacon all darkness to it until something "else like this beholder K'Varn will take up the mantle and themselves be as dangerous or more so than "he ever was."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So the other Horn is still safe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As far as I know. The visions only gave me access to where this one was. I can only assume "that it's out there, but if someone else were to find it, I would know that they probably have "knowledge of the second one existing, as well. I don't know if K'Varn shared this information, but "if someone else takes the mantle of this Horn, what's to stop them from seeking the other?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bummer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Regardless, I appreciate that we're all alive and we're together, and where are we?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you're in our home.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Greyskull Keep. It's in Emon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're in Emon?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, that's wondrous, we can speak with Allura. She would have the wisdom to know what to "do with this next."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hypothetical. What if an army of darkness was slowly approaching Emon to kill all of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What are you saying?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we killed Clarota and K'Varn, but we, there was a lot of bad guys down there that we could not kill--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We hurt that Elder Brain real bad, but not bad enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know much about the illithid themselves, but they reside deep and they are not "fans of the surface. I believe that it was K'Varn's initial onset that was pushing them, both "in union with the duergar and pushing them towards the siege. They spoke of something about bringing "twilight to the surface world. I don't know what that was about, but I fear what knowledge they "have if left alone. At the very least, I know that they're probably having to return and lick their "wounds where we left behind. It would be folly for them, especially knowing that we're aware, to "attack now."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But we can notify those in Kraghammer to buffer their defenses, close the tunnels that you "took down there and my army as well, and that should give us time to prepare if we choose to "seize or at least seal them off."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And your Order is what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Order of the Platinum Dragon."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. That's a really good Order, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: History check, can I do a history check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a religion check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a religion check, not history check?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could roll a history check and probably gain some knowledge based on that, but the--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Could I do it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you'd like to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are you doing a religion check, Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm doing a history check, if you want to do a religion check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll do a religion check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So fucking close.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you guys are familiar loosely with the name Bahamut, you've heard Tiberius bring it up before, you've seen temples to it, but your knowledge knows that Bahamut is very well regarded as the lawful good deity of justice and honor and is primarily one of the great good gods of this pantheon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we're going to trust anyone, I think this is a good--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I feel pretty good about this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I trust the organization, they have a sterling reputation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, Kima. Pie-in-the-sky goal? You would destroy the Horn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If we had the means of doing so, yes. We'd have to talk to the Order, we'd have to talk to "the Council, we'd have to bring people that we could trust and that had the capabilities of "knowing if this were possible how we would go about it. It's beyond my knowledge."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think what worries us is anyone coming in contact with it would be corrupted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't go into contact with it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, of course.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just within range.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, is proximity okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know, I saw it for as long as you did."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This could be bad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Evil Grog?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kind of uncomfortable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The essence of most artifacts like this, it goes more than just touch, one has to be imbued, "bond with these artifacts, to attune with them like any powerful magical item to truly gain its "power, but that's not to say that itself does not contain some sort of foul intelligence."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I go downstairs and go get Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you walk your way down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sings) I've got a lovely bunch of coconuts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're walking past, as you walk past you are immediately met in the hallway by Erwen, your servant, your halfling elder servant who walks up and says, "Dear, I wanted to let you know that a "scroll came for you, some sort of a summons." And he hands it to you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Probably jury duty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he kinda walks past you in the tunnel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Always the worst time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You open it up a little bit, it's not, hasn't been opened, you kinda pull the paper and open it up. It's a summon to the Council of Tal'Dorei, it's written by the hand of the clerk, and it says, essentially, the sovereign Uriel has been notified of your arrival and would like to see you at the council chambers posthaste.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'm still going to go get Grog, but I'll pass the scroll around. Hey Grog, come upstairs.

lines.text: Oh yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: ASHLEY
